titles.title: pass me not o gentle saviour

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
pass me not , O gentle Saviour
Hear my humble cry
While on others thou art calling
Do not pass me by

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Saviour! Saviour!
Hear my humble cry
While on other thou art calling
Do not pass me by

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let me at a throne of mercy
Find a sweet relief
Kneeling there in deep contrition
Help my unbelief

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Trusting only on thy merit
Would i seek thy face
Heal my wounded, broken spirit
Save me by thy grace

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thou the spring of all my comfort
More than life to me
Whom have i in earth beside thee
Whom in heaven but thee ?
